result.ga: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.orig: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.html: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar PhrágDo you know Prague well?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil eolas maiṫ agat ar ṖrágDo you know Prague well?

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: Here's an information leaflet for you.
result.html: Seo chugat bileog eolaisHere's an information leaflet for you.
result.ponchtml: Seo ċugat bileog eolaisHere's an information leaflet for you.

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.html: Eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.
result.ponchtml: Eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.eng: That is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ga: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.orig: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.html: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábharThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ponchtml: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an áḃarThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.

result.eng: All the information is in the leaflet.
result.ga: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.orig: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.html: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileogAll the information is in the leaflet.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-eolas ar fad sa ḃileogAll the information is in the leaflet.

result.eng: An information leaflet is available at request.
result.ga: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.orig: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.html: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidhAn information leaflet is available at request.
result.ponchtml: Tá bileog eolais le fáil aċ í a iarraiḋAn information leaflet is available at request.

result.ga: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.orig: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.html: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sinI know that area.
result.ponchtml: Tá eolas agam ar an ċeantar sinI know that area.

result.eng: We have asked for more information.
result.html: Tá tuilleadh eolais iarrtha againnWe have asked for more information.
result.ponchtml: Tá tuilleaḋ eolais iarrṫa againnWe have asked for more information.

result.eng: More information is available from the office.
result.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.orig: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.html: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifigMore information is available from the office.
result.ponchtml: Tá tuilleaḋ eolais le fáil ón oifigMore information is available from the office.

result.eng: There is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ga: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.orig: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.html: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ponchtml: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: She was collecting information about various people.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.orig: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.html: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi ḋaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.

result.eng: This information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.
result.ga: Tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an Idirlíon
result.orig: Tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an Idirlíon
result.html: Tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an IdirlíonThis information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuaċtáin agus ar an IdirlíonThis information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.

result.eng: The board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ga: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite
result.orig: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite
result.html: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háiteThe board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an clár ag taḃairt eolais faoi stair na háiteThe board was giving information about the history of the place.

result.eng: I translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ga: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge di
result.orig: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge di
result.html: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ponchtml: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
